mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NO, A.USER_TYPE, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_BIRTH, A.USER_BUY_TICKET_YN, B.USER_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_USER A JOIN TBL_USER_CATEGORY B ON (A.USER_CATEGORY_NO = B.USER_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.USER_NAME = #{ username }
